title: Incarnation

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pick two players and merge their spirits.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If either player dies, their spirit will enter the other player, allowing them to perform the dead player's ability alongside their own.
- If you successfully merge two players, the player who gains the ability is notified that they gain the abilities.
- If both your targets die, you will attempt to heal the second player, then merge the first player with them.

desc:
Post 722
*You will be remembered. For seasons upon seasons.*
